It seems I'm having trouble retrieving information about the Battle of Little Round Top and the weather for Gettysburg in early November. 

### Battle of Little Round Top
The Battle of Little Round Top was a significant engagement during the Battle of Gettysburg in the American Civil War, fought on July 2, 1863. It was a key defensive position for the Union Army, held by the 20th Maine Regiment under Colonel Joshua Chamberlain. The battle was marked by intense fighting and strategic maneuvers, ultimately resulting in a Union victory that helped to turn the tide of the war.

### Weather in Gettysburg (Early November)
For the weather in early November, I recommend checking a reliable weather website closer to your travel date for the most accurate forecast. Generally, you can expect cool temperatures, so packing layers, a warm jacket, and possibly rain gear would be wise.

If you have any specific questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
